reviewText: Not sure why this is called the Marquee Movie Collection.  It contains the 4 musicals from the Betty Grable Collection plus 3 items from the Fox Cinema Classics Collection only 1 of which is a musical (Stormy Weather). I may have imagined it but there WAS a Marquee Movie Collection which consisted of the 4 Betty Grable musicals plus 3 other Fox Musicals.  That's what I thought I ordered.  I wouldn't have ordered either Pinky or Island in the Sun but that's what arrived.  Oh well, ebay for those 2.
